title: .NORM Normal File Format
alt: At some point, compression becomes an  aesthetic design choice. Luckily, SVG is a really flexible format, so there's no reason it can't support vector JPEG artifacts.
transcript:
[Cueball is at a computer. Someone is talking to him from off-panel.]
Voice: I sent you the data.
Cueball: Thanks!
Cueball: â€¦this is a Word document containing an embedded photo you took of your screen with the spreadsheet open.
Voice: Yeah? Does your computer not support .NORM files? Maybe you need to update.[Caption below the panel:]
Since everyone sends stuff this way anyway, we should just formalize it as a standard.
